news.title: Higher tariffs are kicking in. Here's what Walmart and other retailers said about their impact
news.summary: Consumer spending has largely stayed strong so far. The pinch from higher duties hasn't been as severe as some companies had feared. The U.S. economy is expected to grow at a strong rate in the second quarter.

news.title: Businesses bringing back recession specials could be the latest sign of deteriorating consumer sentiment
news.summary: The term "recession" has popped up again as a selling point this summer. It may provide a look at how businesses are reacting to consumer sentiment.

news.title: From American Eagle to Swatch, why brands seem to keep getting it so wrong
news.summary: American Eagle, Swatch and Sanex have all sparked backlash recently over their seemingly tone deaf campaigns. American Eagle and Swatch have been accused of being tone deaf.

news.title: Meta to unveil Hypernova smart glasses with a display, wristband at Connect next month
news.summary: Meta's glasses are codenamed Hypernova and will include a small display in the right lens of the device, people familiar with the matter told CNBC.

news.title: Global week ahead: Trump’s Nobel dreams meet economic reality
news.summary: Nobel Laureates are set to meet in Lindau, Germany this week. The Nobel Laureates will meet with President Barack Obama and German Chancellor Angela Merkel.

news.title: I’m a widow with $200,000 in a brokerage account. So why am I treated so poorly?
news.summary: “I had to hunt high and low to have them sell my Tesla stock because it was tanking,” he said. “I was like, ‘What is going on?’”

news.title: ‘The money went into his account’: Is my father trying to swindle me out of my grandparents’ $800K home?
news.summary: “I came across a letter from my father’s bank showing a wire transfer of $195,000 from the buyer,” she says.

news.title: Are you middle class? No, you’re not. Here’s why.
news.summary: The middle class is dead. Long live the middle class. The middle class has been dead for a long time. It's time for a new generation of middle-class Americans.

news.title: I’m getting a $100K personal-injury settlement. Will my estranged wife get any of it?
news.summary: “After we were hit by two major hurricanes, my wife secretly kept the disaster-recovery assistance money,” he said.

news.title: I’m $28,000 in debt. My credit score is suffering. How do I get out of this mess?
news.summary: “I had no credit-card debt until about four years ago. My husband went back to school,” she says. “I was like, ‘Oh my God, I’m in trouble.’”
